summary: Muffin bets, Swingset 2.0, couples costumes and "teej". It's like Terri just reads fan fictions and is like "yep, i'm having...
question: Muffin bets, Swingset 2.0, couples costumes and "teej". It's like Terri just reads fan fictions and is like "yep, i'm having you.. and you... and you!"
answer: I wish they filmed the table reads because I would honestly give anything to see some of the casts’ reactions to the first time they see certain lines or scenes lmao. It’s amazing that they manage to fit in so much of what seems like fan service without actually making it feel like fan service… like that’s just how perfectly these characters are written for each other lmao.

It’s amazing that they manage to fit in so much of what seems like fan service without actually making it feel like fan service… like that’s just how perfectly these characters are written for each other lmao.

summary: IIRC, didn't people think Wyrus would be a thing even before the picture? Wasn't it like as soon as people first heard of the...
question: IIRC, didn't people think Wyrus would be a thing even before the picture? Wasn't it like as soon as people first heard of the character Walker, they started thinking he'd be Cyrus' love interest? I know you don't like Smurf, and I could be misremembering, but I'm sure he made a video about that Walker/Cyrus photo, and that was after people had started thinking Walker would be his love interest. Could be mistaken though.
answer: Yeah, I think it predated the beanie pic but that’s what really had people going leading up to the actual introduction of Walker’s character. I was just a tag lurker back then so I don’t have a vivid memory of the timeline, but I remember minor whispers about Darius’ involvement in the series toward the very beginning of season 2 airing, before Tyrus was a thing and a few months before the ~beanie bros~ pic was posted. But the pic was posted just a few weeks before Bash Mitzvah aired so then more people were like OH, MAYBE THIS IS A THING… but yeah. Everyone was: very wrong.

But the pic was posted just a few weeks before Bash Mitzvah aired so then more people were like OH, MAYBE THIS IS A THING… but yeah. Everyone was: very wrong.

But the pic was posted just a few weeks before Bash Mitzvah aired so then more people were like OH, MAYBE THIS IS A THING… but yeah. Everyone was: very wrong.

tags: they actually gave jonah a good relationship just to throw it away because of jamber
summary: The fact that Jibby was broken up off screen is still so absurd to me because, they knew they had Millie for 2 episodes, they...
body:
The fact that Jibby was broken up off screen is still so absurd to me because, they knew they had Millie for 2 episodes, they easily could have ended their relationship in 3x10 with Libby having a valid reason to end things with Jonah saying it was too late for him to try to learn ASL so late in the relationship and Jonah learning the lesson of making an effort to communicate with your partner (which is a lesson he clearly hasn’t applied to his relationship with Amber at all, so what was even the point again?)

Instead they just end their relationship offscreen through an unreliable narrator without an actual explanation to why they broke off, 3 episodes later, after making us think for a week that Jonah was a cheater, with 2 sentences. 

Sometimes I really don’t get the people running this show.

Instead they just end their relationship offscreen through an unreliable narrator without an actual explanation to why they broke off, 3 episodes later, after making us think for a week that Jonah was a cheater, with 2 sentences. 

Sometimes I really don’t get the people running this show.

Sometimes I really don’t get the people running this show.

tags: wow this is my peak in life
summary: ANDI-MACK IS A SKAM REMAKE
body:
ANDI-MACK IS A SKAM REMAKE

why andy mack is a skam remake a TEDtalk by skam-awakening:

1.)The character isak in og skam is played by a man by the name of tarjei in andy mack there is a character named TJ.

2.) skam season 3 is focused on the gays in andi mack season 3 it is as well.

3.)in og skam there’s a bitch named emma and in andi mack there’s a bitch named kira. (they’re doing nothing wrong directly but still)

4.)back to season 1 andi (andi mack eva)’s love interest’s name is jonah that’s basically the american version of jonas.

5.)Buffy aka noora chris and sana all at the same time. becuase she plays basketball so does sana, she’s down to fight like chris, and moves away then back like noora in season three

6.) but there’s no vilde? you may be asking and i think that’s simply because disney just couldn’t handle the complexity that is vilde

7.) andi is eva and noora at the same time cause cyrus is vilde in the them both liking william aka jonas aka jonah

8.) the swing set is where the gays go to calm down you know what the skam og gays do to calm down? DRUGS so disney obviously couldn’t have that so the took the swings which go high

9.) amber in season one ingrid but before eva steals her from jonas

10.) the tj’s friends having a gun thing parallels druck william hitting a dude with a skateboard becuase they both report said actions to the police before their love interest makes them

11.)TJ’s dyslectic plot connects to eva being a dumbass

12.)andi and jonah break up mutually much like eva and jonas

13.) the guy who plays TJ kinda looks like Even

14.) ANDI-MACK HAS TEXT CHATS AS WELL??!!!!! (i didn’t know this till like a couple minutes ago )

this is the true tea *drops microphone*

blog.name: djheckingfruity
blog.title: Tyrus: Make That Ish Official
blog.description: Jay | She/her | 16 | Andi Mack said be gay do crime | Icon credit @tyrus-chips

summary: Just shows hoe much of kind, sensitive and really pure dork TJ is to have come up with that costume idea. AND how proud he was...
question: Just shows hoe much of kind, sensitive and really pure dork TJ is to have come up with that costume idea. AND how proud he was to suggest it, like he was really excited and looking forward to having a run day (with lots of selfies) with the person who makes him happiest. Then Kira comes along, a potential friend who also likes basketball (considering he still lost all his others) and instead, he's made to feel being seen as gay is wrong, manipulated into a toxic pairing and pushes Cyrus away.
answer: Ahsndksjns I know. That episode did a lot to my emotions. I have no idea how I’ll survive the hiatus

summary: Just how clearly disgusted TJ was when Kira tried flirting with him and how much he lit up when Cyrus arrived. My precious gold...
question: Just how clearly disgusted TJ was when Kira tried flirting with him and how much he lit up when Cyrus arrived. My precious gold star is so innocent under that scarybasketball exterior.
answer: Is this the face you make if you’re no homo with your bro? Absolutely not. Love the way, like you said, his face lights up as soon as he sees Cyrus

blog.name: kiss-my-ass-shinigami
blog.description: hi, welcome to issy's

tags: i love andi but the show is letting her down
the way she talked to bex and bowie last episode was like a final straw for me i got so mad
i just hope that she can be held accountable at least once
the way shes acting is NOT something the show should aim to promote
i also hate how she almost always seems to have to be right
let her make mistakes and be weong and get punished and feel bad
thats all i ask of her writing
summary: I'm not gonna blindly hate Andi for like being 13. Nobody should she's a kid she's allowed to overreact and make mistakes and be...
body:
I’m not gonna blindly hate Andi for like being 13. Nobody should she’s a kid she’s allowed to overreact and make mistakes and be passionate and be emotional.

However, it’s getting exhausting to watch every storyline play out with Andi saying purposefully mean and harsh things to the people around her in retaliation to their mistakes or their decisions. There never seem to be consequences and she never seems to apologise.

I just hope from the bottom of my heart that the writing for Andi gets better soon. She’s a passionate, excitable and loving character in a rough series of situations but none of that seems to be at the forefront of her character anymore. She used to mean a lot to me and I hope we can get back to that.

She used to mean a lot to me and I hope we can get back to that.

blog.description: mikayla 💞 21 💞 i follow from @bigtimedyke ❤ icon by spidaerman

summary: sexuality hcs for all the charcaters?
question: sexuality hcs for all the charcaters?
answer:
surprised i haven’t answered this before tbh dsdhksdhs 

andi is a lesbian going through some bad compulsive heterosexuality and i feel for her. cyrus is canonically gay!! no room for hcs here! buffy is definitely bi. im honestly never too sure about jonah but i could see him being aro/ace. tj is gay, babey! amber is a lesbian and i love her, and tbh lets throw iris into the lesbian mix?? i like that. i could see walker ID’ing as bi or pan. bex and bowie are both bicons, obviously. and i hc libby as liking girls but i don’t think i have a solid hc for her

surprised i haven’t answered this before tbh dsdhksdhs 

andi is a lesbian going through some bad compulsive heterosexuality and i feel for her. cyrus is canonically gay!! no room for hcs here! buffy is definitely bi. im honestly never too sure about jonah but i could see him being aro/ace. tj is gay, babey! amber is a lesbian and i love her, and tbh lets throw iris into the lesbian mix?? i like that. i could see walker ID’ing as bi or pan. bex and bowie are both bicons, obviously. and i hc libby as liking girls but i don’t think i have a solid hc for her
